Description.Text: Surrounded by art galleries, shops and award-winning restaurants in the lively Tribeca neighbourhood of lower Manhattan, this boutique hotel named Duane Street Hotel offers first-rate services and memorable facilities. Offering personalised services and fine hospitality, Duane Street Hotel New York is the perfect lodging option for those who are seeking facilities as well as comfort in an ideal location. Some of the notable area attractions of the city are Empire State Building and Ellis Island. Conveniently located in New York City, Duane Street Hotel's location allows guests to explore interesting points of interest such as Times Square, Central Park and Statue of Liberty.

• Woolworth Building - 0.4 km / 0.3 mi • St. Paul's Chapel - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi • Museum of Chinese in Americas - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi • Federal Reserve Bank of New York - 0.9 km / 0.6 mi • New York Stock Exchange - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi • Brooklyn Bridge - 1.9 km / 1.2 mi • Ellis Island - 3.3 km / 2.1 mi • Empire State Building - 4.1 km / 2.5 mi • Statue of Liberty - 4.3 km / 2.7 mi • Grand Central Terminal - 4.7 km / 2.9 mi • Chrysler Building - 4.8 km / 3 mi • Times Square - 4.8 km / 3 mi • Broadway - 5 km / 3.1 mi • Rockefeller Plaza - 5.4 km / 3.3 mi • Central Park - 8.3 km / 5.2 mi

Duane Street Hotel Tribeca offers 45 guestrooms. Beds feature premium bedding. Plasma televisions come with premium cable/satellite channels. Wireless Internet access is provided along with multi-line phones, CD players, and free local calls. Bathrooms include separate bathtubs and showers, bathrobes, slippers, and makeup/shaving mirrors. Direct-dial phones, complimentary weekday newspapers, and air conditioning are also included. Extra towels/bedding and wake-up calls can be requested. Cribs (infant beds) are also available. A nightly turndown service and housekeeping are provided. All guestrooms are non-smoking. Duane Street Hotel Tribeca has a full-service health spa on site.

This hotel features a full-service health spa and spa services. Business-related amenities at this 3.5-star property include a business center and secretarial services. This New York property provides an airport shuttle (surcharge). This property also offers a fitness facility, multilingual staff, and dry cleaning/laundry services. Duane Street Hotel Tribeca is a smoke-free property.
• Golf - driving range • Dock • Boating • Aerobics • Bicycle rentals • Helicopter/airplane sightseeing
Pets not allowed Check-in time is 3 PM Check-out time is Noon
Duane Street Hotel Tribeca has a restaurant serving breakfast only. Room service during limited hours is available.
